sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STIVIERE, a market-town in the delegation of Mantua, in Austrian Lombardy, usually distinguished by the name Castiglione della Stiviere. It stands in a strong position, and has a castle, eight churches, and 5460 inhabitants ; and is remarkable for the victory of the French over the Austrians in 1796. Long. 10. 47. E. Lat. 45. 42. N.
